overview: At her husband's funeral, Pearl, Jewish mother of two divorced and antagonistic daughters, meets an old Italian friend of her husband, whose advice years previously had stopped the husband leaving home. For 23 years he, now a widower, has secretly loved Pearl...
tagline: A story about love, family and other embarrassments.
cast: Shirley MacLaine|Marcello Mastroianni|Bob Dishy|Jessica Tandy|Kathy Bates
